snippet.title: Slime Legion Official Branding Video | Slime Legion |Roguelike+ Tower Defense  #合合合英雄  #slimelegion
snippet.description:
Slime Legion is a casual game that combines Tower Defense, Merge, and Roguelike. Evil heroes have invaded, be a brave little devil to surround your homeland.
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/sg/app/slime-legion/id1664686966
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hero.may.cry.adventure.game&hl=en&gl=US
